title: Unreported World - The Devil's Highway  (Ch 4) 2008 02 15 xvi
description:
Unreported World - The Devil&#039;s Highway  (Ch 4) 2008 02 15 xvid 


Aidan Hartley visits the borderlands between northern Mexico and Arizona to investigate the migration problem. He meets the young Mexicans risking their lives to cross the huge and hostile desert; he talks to people smugglers who help them; he spends a night with the "Minutemen", vigilantes patrolling the border who are convinced they&#039;re in a war against terrorists; and he talks to the mayor who wants to deport all illegal immigrants (up to 20 million people) from the US, full stop. It adds up to a poignant picture of the frontier between rich and poor worlds.
